review: I am posting this on behalf of my father who is approaching 70 yrs now.He was not comfortable and literally scared to extract his teeth and to implant both upper and lower jaw. I forced him many times and finally decided to meet Dr. Udhayaraja about this. He was very polite and helping my father to understand his situation and explained very clearly about his procedure. That gave the confidence and made my father very comfortable. After meeting this doctor, my father finally accepted and he is with his new teeth now !! :) I would like to thank Dr. Udhayaraja and Dr. Jamuna for the excellent service. I have to mention the office staff as well! They were very humble in answering the phone whenever we call them for any queries. Thank you again!

Dr. Jamuna Udhayaraja handles my full family Tooth problems. My wife and son went to her Clinic last month. One of my daughter's agenda when she visits India from the U.S is to visit Dr. Jamuna for her tooth maintenance, as needed. I got my Crown fitted yesterday and she slightly ground my other crown on the upper side which was fitted by her around 2006. A good dentist and.a great and well equipped Clinic to visit.

I've known aunty and uncle for a really long time. And their services have always been top notch and very high quality.. i go only to them whenever i have an issue with my tooth. I can't and don't want to trust anyone other than Dr Udhayaraja s clinic and team of doctors.

I have been taking treatment in her clinic for the past 15 years and my experience had been very good.Both Dr. Udayaraja and Dr.Jamuna are very amicable and friendly.**** **** ***** ** **** ********* *** I am free from many dental problems.Though I have shifted my residence to korattur,I come to their clinic,as I am very comfortable with them

Dr Rahul explained every bit and kept the whole procedure comfortable. He informed when it might pain or sensitive. A very friendly and efficient Dr. He was very patient and explained the issues 
How I might feel with the gaps after cleaning. Every minute detail was patiently explained and I was made to feel comfortable throughout.

Both the doctors treated my parents and they came all the way from Gujarat to address their dental problems...their kindness was overwhelming. I can never forget that... Thank you
I and my son continue to be their patients for their professional advice and kindness
Thank you
Nirmala kurien

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Apart from the doc being friendly and making the patient at ease, she is very professional and did a wonderful job of extracting pre molars of my daughter without any stress or pain during or post the extraction. I would strongly recommend her for dental procedures if one is based in Chennai.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr was kind.
She guided me properly.
She gave me varous options with their usefulness.
The clinic is neat and tidy.
All staff are good .
I know the Doctors for a long time and they are very professinal in their approach.
For any dental  issues any one can approach them easily.

They are my doctors from childhood days since 35 years.So genuine and treat like family members.No chances of rework.Does painless ,fearless treatment and worth the money you spend for treatment.Most important give options on diagnosis and Handle with care.
Dr Jamuna is very understanding and very professional. She instantly made my son at ease by explaining what was going to be done as treatment.
